title: Same kind of font as the Rubrik family one !
content:
I'm looking for A font family that would look like the Rubrik one = with rounded endings, with several weights.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/newlyn/rubrik/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313143220/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/newlyn/rubrik/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/newlyn/rubrik/")

Also, I you want, give me advise with what other font I can't mix it, I mean what serif font do you think would match well with this sans serif rounded endings font ?

Thanks !

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313143220im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Rubrik_6550.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Rubrik-2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313143220/http:/typophile.com/files/Rubrik-2.png) | 17.25 KB |
author: Kaedi

comments.content:
For a possible lower cost similar font [http://www.identifont.com/similar?2I1X](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313143220/http:/www.identifont.com/similar?2I1X "http://www.identifont.com/similar?2I1X")  
Don
